import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; // components import Footer from '../../components/Footer'; const App = () => { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); // Data contoh untuk card materi const lessonCards = [ { id: 1, title: "Dasar-Dasar Python", description: "Pelajari fundamental Python seperti variabel, tipe data, operator, dan sintaksis dasar.", level: "Pemula", duration: "2 jam", lessons: 5, progress: 0, image: "🐍", topics: [ "Variabel dan Tipe Data", "Operator Aritmatika", "String Operations", "Input dan Output", "Komentar dalam Kode" ], color: "#4F46E5" }, { id: 2, title: "Struktur Kontrol", description: "Pahami percabangan dan perulangan untuk membuat logika program yang lebih kompleks.", level: "Pemula", duration: "3 jam", lessons: 6, progress: 0, image: "🔄", topics: [ "Pernyataan If-Else", "Perulangan For", "Perulangan While", "Break dan Continue", "Nested Loops" ], color: "#10B981" }, { id: 3, title: "Fungsi dan Modul", description: "Pelajari cara membuat fungsi reusable dan mengorganisir kode dengan modul.", level: "Menengah", duration: "4 jam", lessons: 7, progress: 0, image: "📦", topics: [ "Definisi Fungsi", "Parameter dan Argumen", "Return Values", "Scope Variabel", "Import Modul" ], color: "#8B5CF6" }, { id: 4, title: "Struktur Data", description: "Eksplorasi list, tuple, dictionary, dan set untuk menyimpan data secara efisien.", level: "Menengah", duration: "5 jam", lessons: 8, progress: 0, image: "🗃️", topics: [ "List dan List Comprehension", "Tuple dan Operations", "Dictionary Methods", "Set Operations", "Manipulasi Data" ], color: "#F59E0B" } ]; const toggleMenu = () => { setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); }; const handleStartLesson = (lessonId) => { alert(`Memulai pelajaran dengan ID: ${lessonId}`); // Di sini nanti bisa navigasi ke halaman detail pelajaran }; // Komponen untuk card pelajaran const LessonCard = ({ card }) => (
{card.image}
{card.level}

{card.description}

Topik yang dipelajari:

    {card.topics.map((topic, index) => (
  • • {topic}
    • ))}
📚 {card.lessons} Pelajaran

Progress Belajar {card.progress}%
); return (
